nodes.text: Culpharm was a pharmaceutical company that operated in the Cularin system during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

In about 32 BBY, some of Culpharm's specimen samples went missing, so Carlitina Semla, it's head of security, hired the Heroes of Cularin to investigate their disappearance. A short time afterward, Culpharm was tipped off that Genasys, a rival company, was going to make a deal with the Cerean Higgie Sethven to develop a new type of drug. Culpharm responded by sending a security team to the shop Natural, on Cularin, where the deal was taking place, to stop it from happening.
During the Clone Wars, a group of Culpharm scientists were captured by the Dark Jedi Raik Muun, who took them to her base on Tilnes, where she forced them to carry out experiments on the t'salak.
